typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TXTSH as string,
		CONSUMER_RTM as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Z_TCONSUMERRTMKT
source(output(
		COMP_CODE as string,
		REC_TYPE as string,
		CURTYPE as string,
		VTYPE as string,
		VERSION as string,
		CO_DOC_NO as string,
		REFER_DOC as string,
		REFER_ITM as string,
		CO_ITEM_NO as string,
		RECORDMODE as string,
		FISCPER as string,
		FISCVARNT as string,
		BUS_AREA as string,
		CO_AREA as string,
		FUNC_AREA as string,
		DISTR_CHAN as string,
		DIVISION as string,
		BIC_ZCPAACASS as string,
		CUSTOMER as string,
		BIC_ZEBZRESEL as string,
		BIC_ZEBZREVPA as string,
		BIC_ZCPAENDUS as string,
		BIC_ZCPAFAREA as string,
		MATL_GROUP as string,
		BIC_ZDRWWNOD as string,
		PLANT as string,
		PROD_HIER as string,
		MATERIAL as string,
		MAT_SALES as string,
		PROFIT_CTR as string,
		SALESORG as string,
		BILL_TYPE as string,
		BIC_ZCPACADOC as string,
		BIC_ZCPACAITM as string,
		COSTELMNT as string,
		CHRT_ACCTS as string,
		COSTOBJ as string,
		GI_DATE as string,
		DOC_DATE as string,
		BIC_ZCPAORDNO as string,
		PART_PRCTR as string,
		PSTNG_DATE as string,
		S_ORD_ITEM as string,
		DOC_NUMBER as string,
		ABCPROCESS as string,
		COSTCENTER as string,
		WBS_ELEMT as string,
		BIC_ZCPACLTV as string,
		COUNTRY as string,
		BIC_ZCPAPLACI as string,
		LOGSYS as string,
		BIC_ZLOADDATE as string,
		BIC_ZDRWWGMC as string,
		BIC_ZDRPAPH1 as string,
		BIC_ZCPAFREIG as double,
		BIC_ZCPALISPR as double,
		BIC_ZCPAINVOA as double,
		QUANTITY as double,
		COPAREVEN as double,
		CUST_DSCNT as double,
		PROD_DSCNT as double,
		QTY_DSCNT as double,
		COPASPROM as double,
		CASH_DSCNT as double,
		VOL_REBATE as double,
		COPAODSCNT as double,
		COPADISCT as double,
		COPANETSL as double,
		SALES_CMSN as double,
		SPCDSLS_CS as double,
		ACCRDFR_CS as double,
		COPADIRSL as double,
		COPANETRV as double,
		DIRMAT_CS as double,
		VARPROD_CS as double,
		COPACOGSV as double,
		COPAMRGN1 as double,
		MATOVHD as double,
		FIXPROD_CS as double,
		COPACOGSF as double,
		COPAMRGN2 as double,
		COPAVRNCS as double,
		COPAMRGN3 as double,
		MARKETING as double,
		SALES_CS as double,
		ADMNSTRTN as double,
		RSRCH_DEV as double,
		LOGISTICS as double,
		OTHER_OVHD as double,
		COPAOVHDC as double,
		COPAPROFT as double,
		COPACOGS as double,
		BIC_ZZGRPCOGS as double,
		BIC_ZCPACOGM as double,
		COPASLQTY as double,
		BIC_ZZGRPCTA as double,
		ROWCNT as double,
		COPASLQTU as string,
		UNIT as string,
		CURRENCY as string,
		BIC_ZGRPCURR as string,
		FISCYEAR as string,
		CALQUARTER as string,
		CALQUART1 as string,
		BIC_ZCPAVALU4 as double,
		BIC_ZCPAVALU5 as double,
		BIC_ZCPAVALU6 as double,
		BIC_ZCPAVALU7 as double,
		BIC_ZCPAVALU8 as double,
		BIC_ZCPAVALU9 as double,
		BIC_ZCPAVLU11 as double,
		BIC_ZCPAVLU12 as double,
		BIC_ZCPAVLU13 as double,
		INVCD_QTY as double,
		BASE_UOM as string,
		BIC_ZANFLAG as string,
		BILL_DATE as string,
		BIC_ZBKING_DT as string,
		BIC_ZBKINGREL as string,
		BIC_ZDOCCURR as string,
		EXCHG_RATE as decimal(10,0),
		CREATEDON as string,
		BIC_ZCPAVAL10 as double,
		BIC_ZCPWWBRC as string,
		BIC_ZCPWWMUC as string,
		BIC_ZCPVV015 as double,
		BIC_ZCPVV016 as double,

		BIC_ZCPVV018 as double,
		BIC_ZCPVV102 as double,
		REGION as string,
		BIC_ZBKVALDC as double,
		BIC_ZSDKURFDT as string,
		BIC_ZINVCAN as double,
		BIC_ZDCMEMO as double,
		BIC_ZZZVTEXT1 as string,
		BIC_ZSDKBETR as double,
		KNVAL as double,
		BIC_ZSDVARCON as string,
		CUST_GROUP as string,
		COND_CURR as string,
		BIC_ZSOLDPREG as string,
		BIC_ZSOLDPCNT as string,
		BIC_ZCPAVLU19 as double,
		BIC_ZNODERANG as string,
		BIC_ZSDKONDA as string,
		BIC_ZCPAVLU20 as double,
		DOC_CURRCY as string,
		BIC_ZCDRWWNOD as double,
		BIC_ZZTP as string,
		BIC_ZCPAVALTP as double,
		BIC_ZWW003 as string,
		BIC_ZLEBKFLG as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Z_OHZCPIK002
source(output(
		DOC_NUMBER as string,
		S_ORD_ITEM as string,
		Final_quantity as double,
		ORDER_QUANTITY as double,
		TARGET_QUANTITY as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Z_OHZSDIK002
exp_Initial_e1, lkp_Z_TCONSUMERRTMKT derive(OUT_COUNTRY = 'LTRIM(RTRIM(Z_OHZCPIK002@COUNTRY))',
		O_TARGET_QUANTITY = 'IIF(ISNULL(Z_OHZSDIK002@TARGET_QUANTITY),0,Z_OHZSDIK002@TARGET_QUANTITY)',
		O_Final_quantity = iif(Z_OHZCPIK002.DOC_NUMBER == ' ',Z_OHZCPIK002.INVCD_QTY,Z_OHZSDIK002.Final_quantity),
		OUT_CURRENCY = '--IIF(ISNULL(Z_OHZCPIK002@CURRENCY),"USD",Z_OHZCPIK002@CURRENCY)    IIF((Z_OHZCPIK002@DOC_NUMBER=" "), Z_OHZCPIK002@/BIC/ZDOCCURR, DECODE(REG_MATCH(Z_OHZCPIK002@DOC_CURRCY, "[a-z][A-Z]"), TRUE, Z_OHZCPIK002@DOC_CURRCY, "USD"))',
		OUT_FLAG = '"I"',
		LOAD_DT = 'SESSSTARTTIME',
		O_ORDER_QUANTITY = 'IIF(ISNULL(Z_OHZSDIK002@ORDER_QUANTITY),0,Z_OHZSDIK002@ORDER_QUANTITY)',
		OUT_DOC_NUMBER = 'IIF(Z_OHZCPIK002@DOC_NUMBER=" ", "M" || Z_OHZCPIK002@CO_DOC_NO,Z_OHZCPIK002@DOC_NUMBER)') ~> exp_Initial
exp_Initial split(OUT_FLAG == 'I',
	disjoint: false) ~> rtr_ORDER_DATA@(Case_WC_OHZCPIK002_DS, Case_WC_OHZCPIK002_DS_BKUP)
Z_OHZCPIK002, Z_OHZSDIK002 lookup(Z_OHZCPIK002@DOC_NUMBER == Z_OHZSDIK002@DOC_NUMBER
	&& Z_OHZCPIK002@S_ORD_ITEM == Z_OHZSDIK002@S_ORD_ITEM,
	broadcast: 'none')~> lkp_Z_OHZSIDKOO2
exp_Initial_e1, Z_TCONSUMERRTMKT lookup(exp_Initial_e1@v_CONSUMER_ROUTE_TO_MKT == Z_TCONSUMERRTMKT@CONSUMER_RTM,
	broadcast: 'none')~> lkp_Z_TCONSUMERRTMKT
Z_OHZCPIK002, lkp_Z_OHZSIDKOO2 derive(v_CONSUMER_ROUTE_TO_MKT = 'LTRIM(RTRIM(Z_OHZCPIK002@/BIC/ZWW003))') ~> exp_Initial_e1
rtr_ORDER_DATA@Case_WC_OHZCPIK002_DS sink() ~> WC_OHZCPIK002_DS
rtr_ORDER_DATA@Case_WC_OHZCPIK002_DS_BKUP sink() ~> WC_OHZCPIK002_DS_BKUP
